scripts.dev: concurrently -n frontend,backend -c blue,green "bun run dev:frontend" "bun run dev:backend"
scripts.dev:backend: cd ../JM-Backend && git pull && docker compose up -d --build --force-recreate
scripts.dev:backend:clean: cd ../JM-Backend && git pull && docker compose build --no-cache && docker compose up -d --force-recreate
scripts.dev:backend:auth: cd ../JM-Backend && docker compose build --no-cache auth-service && docker compose up -d --force-recreate auth-service
scripts.dev:backend:profile: cd ../JM-Backend && docker compose build --no-cache profile-service && docker compose up -d --force-recreate profile-service
scripts.dev:ja:frontend: cd ../JA-Frontend && git pull && bun run dev
scripts.dev:ja:backend: cd ../JA-Backend && git pull && docker compose up -d --build --force-recreate
scripts.sync: cd ../JM-Backend && git pull && git submodule update --remote --recursive && echo "Synced JM-Backend"
scripts.buildx: bun ff && bun lint && bun run build
